trans-unit.source: A service requires two configuration files, which are XML files:
trans-unit.target: A service requires two configuration files, which are XML files:

trans-unit.source: The service definition file describes the service model.
trans-unit.target: The service definition file describes the service model.

trans-unit.source: It defines the roles included with the service and their endpoints, and declares configuration settings for each role.
trans-unit.target: It defines the roles included with the service and their endpoints, and declares configuration settings for each role.

trans-unit.source: The default extension for the service definition file is .csdef.
trans-unit.target: The default extension for the service definition file is .csdef.

trans-unit.source: The service configuration file specifies the number of instances to deploy for each role and provides values for any configuration settings declared in the service definition file.
trans-unit.target: The service configuration file specifies the number of instances to deploy for each role and provides values for any configuration settings declared in the service definition file.

trans-unit.source: The default extension for the service configuration file is .cscfg.
trans-unit.target: The default extension for the service configuration file is .cscfg.

trans-unit.source: For optionally using a virtual network or configuring diagnostics, you can use:
trans-unit.target: For optionally using a virtual network or configuring diagnostics, you can use:

trans-unit.source: The network configuration file, which describes Virtual Network configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: The network configuration file, which describes Virtual Network configuration settings.

trans-unit.source: The diagnostics configuration file, which describes the values that are used to initialize the Diagnostics Monitor.
trans-unit.target: The diagnostics configuration file, which describes the values that are used to initialize the Diagnostics Monitor.

trans-unit.source: The name of the file is diagnostics.wadcfg.
trans-unit.target: The name of the file is diagnostics.wadcfg.

trans-unit.source: This reference describes the schema for each file.
trans-unit.target: This reference describes the schema for each file.
